comment: "This is an update -- when I had a regular ongoing publication relationship with Nerve, they only paid me $20 a piece. They solicited me directly to write this one, which was for a promotional sequence associated with the release of a new TV show on USA, and gave me $300. So YMMV!"
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "Nerve always pays $20 an article, no matter how long. I have written for them consistently over the past year. They usually take 30 days to pay and cut a cheque rather than direct deposit or Paypal."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
